trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands"></xref> event of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Disponibiliza dados para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands"> </xref> eventos de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: An instance of a ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs object is automatically created and passed to the event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event of an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de um objeto de ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs é automaticamente criada e transmitida para o processador de eventos para o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>evento de <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>

trans-unit.source: An inherited class or event handler can use this event to show commands unique to the item, by changing the collection of commands in the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um processador de eventos ou classe herdado pode utilizar este evento para mostrar os comandos exclusivo para o item, alterando a coleção de comandos no <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.Commands%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs> object, initializing the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> properties with the values of the `item` and `commands` parameters, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Constrói um novo <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs>objeto ao inicializar o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A>Propriedades com os valores do `item` e `commands` parâmetros, respetivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.ListItem*>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*> property.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListShowCommandsEventArgs.Commands*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the collection of commands in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a coleção de comandos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: Initially, the collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Inicialmente, a coleção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: You can add or remove commands in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: Pode adicionar ou remover comandos da coleção, utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A>métodos para a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection>classe</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to access and modify the commands for a single item in an <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object during the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> event.
trans-unit.target: Pode utilizar esta propriedade para aceder e modificar os comandos para um único item num <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>objeto durante a <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands>eventos.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList.ShowItemCommands> </xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: Changes made do not affect the base collection of commands specified for the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList> object.
trans-unit.target: As alterações efetuadas não afetam a coleção de base dos comandos especificados para o <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectList>

trans-unit.source: The collection of commands in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de comandos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.MobileControls.ObjectListCommandCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Devolve o item da lista de comandos especificados que será apresentada.

trans-unit.source: This API is obsolete.
trans-unit.target: Esta API está obsoleta.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see the [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) Web site.
trans-unit.target: Para obter informações sobre como desenvolver aplicações móveis do ASP.NET, consulte o [www.asp.net/mobile](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=182900) do Web site.

trans-unit.source: The list item for the specified commands that will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: O item da lista de comandos especificados que será apresentada.
